title: Overpay To Get Your Guy?
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and David Dennis Jr. debate what the Suns matching the offer sheet on Deandre Ayton means for Kevin Durant and Phoenix and if it feels inevitable that the Knicks will overpay to get their guy Donovan Mitchell.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (debatable): How Does Deandre Ayton Signing Back With The Suns Impact Kevin Durant?
